resources.string: Set the time that you want to be sent your quote below.
This is the settings page. You can pick and test the number that you want to receive messages at.

Starfruit texts you a motivational quote at whatever time you choose every day. 

Starfruit uses your phone's built-in messaging app to send quotes, keeping the app completely microtransaction and ad free! 

If you are enjoying the app, I would really appreciate a review. 

Any questions, comments, or feedback? email me at xinyunzhouu@gmail.com!
A notification channel for the Starfruit app
